snippet.title: Chessaria: The Tactical Adventure - Story Trailer
snippet.description: Chessaria delivers for the first time ever, classic Chess combat backed with an epic fantasy quest. Challenge your tactical skills as you battle for Chessaria's destiny. Available on Steam http://bit.ly/PlayChessaria
